row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- ! Belegen Variablen :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&PROGRAM#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&PROGRAM#.csv' ! --------------------------------------------- ! Erstellen ini-Datei cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# BUCH_PER = &BUCH_PER# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# LOESCH_BUCHP_VON = &LOESCH_BUCHP_VON# LOESCH_BUCHP_BIS = &LOESCH_BUCHP_BIS# COMMIT = &COMMIT# TRACE = &TRACE# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- ! FÃ¼r Deploymenttest OUT-Datei erzeugen :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
